original: Pools the remaining health of the target and the caster and evenly splits the result between them. Only works on living creatures; does not count as an attack.
string: 将目标的剩余生命和施法者的剩余生命相加并平分。仅对活着的生物起作用；不视作攻击。

original: For <dur> seconds, you gain <mag>% fire resistance and absorb <30>% of the magicka from hostile fire spells.
string: <dur>秒内，你的火焰抗性提升<mag>%，并吸收<30>%来自敌对火焰法术的魔力。

original: Swap your remaining health with the target's remaining health. Only works on living creatures; does not count as an attack.
string: 将你剩余的生命与目标剩余生命交换。仅对活着的生物起作用；不视作攻击。

original: For <dur> seconds, you gain <mag>% shock resistance and your weapon attacks deal <15> shock damage.
string: <dur>秒内，你的闪电抗性增加<mag>%，武器攻击造成<15>点闪电伤害。

original: Cures all diseases and stops the effects of poison.
string: 治愈所有疾病并消除毒素效果。

original: Cure yourself of all diseases and curses, including vampirism and lycanthropy.
string: 治愈所有疾病和诅咒，包括吸血鬼化和狼人化。

original: Bring a recently dead person or creature back to life. Undead, daedra, and machines cannot be revived.
string: 使刚死去的人或生物复活。亡灵、迪德拉和机器无法复活。

original: Appear spectral for <dur> seconds, improving sneaking by <20>% and increasing the power of fear spells by <15>%.
string: 呈现幽灵状态，潜行效果提高<20>%，恐惧法术效果提高<15>%，持续<dur>秒。

original: Creates a magic shield for <dur> seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.
string: 创造一面魔法盾，持续<dur>秒。收起即可驱散。

original: Creates a magic chest for <dur> seconds. Items stored inside can be accessed at any time by summoning the chest.
string: 创造一面魔法盾，持续<dur>秒。可通过召唤箱子来随时取用其中物品。

original: Summons a Sabrecat Familiar for <dur> seconds. While active, your Sabrecat Familiar boosts your attack damage by +<mag>%.
string: 召唤一个剑齿虎使魔，持续<dur>秒。剑齿虎使魔会使你的攻击伤害提高<mag>%。

original: Your Sabrecat Familiar grants you +<10>% attack damage.
string: 剑齿虎使魔使你的攻击伤害提高<10>%。

original: Your Direwolf Familiar grants you +<mag>% movement speed.
string: 你的冰原狼使魔使你的速度提高<mag>%。

original: Your Bear Familiar grants you +<mag> armor.
string: 你的熊使魔使你的护甲值提高<mag>点。

original: Your Troll Familiar grants you +<mag>% health regeneration.
string: 你的巨魔使魔使你的生命恢复速度提高<mag>%。

original: Summons a Bear Familiar for <dur> seconds. While active, your Bear Familiar grants you +<mag> armor.
string: 召唤一个熊使魔，持续<dur>秒。你的熊使魔会使你的护甲值提高<mag>点。

original: Summons a Troll Familiar for <dur> seconds. While active, your Troll Familiar boosts your health regeneration by +<mag>%.
string: 召唤一个巨魔使魔，持续<dur>秒。你的巨魔使魔会使你的生命恢复速度提高<mag>%。

original: Summons a Direwolf Familiar for <dur> seconds. While active, your Direwolf Familiar boosts your speed by +<mag>%.
string: 召唤一个冰原狼使魔，持续<dur>秒。你的冰原狼使魔会使你的速度提高<mag>%。

original: Open locked doors and containers. The higher your Alteration skill, the stronger the locks that can be opened.
string: 打开上锁的门和容器。你的变化系技能越高，就能打开越牢固的锁。

original: Summons a Mammoth Familiar <dur> seconds. While active, your Mammoth Familiar boosts your health and stamina by <mag> points. (Can only be cast outside)
string: 召唤一个猛犸使魔，持续<dur>秒。你的猛犸使魔会使你的生命和耐力提高<mag>点。（只能在室外召唤）

original: Your Mammoth Familiar grants you +<mag> health
string: 你的猛犸使魔使你的生命

original: Cast on a corpse to store it in a pocket of Oblivion. Cast again to retrieve the corpse.
string: 对尸体施放此咒语，将其存放于湮灭之袋中。再次施放可取回尸体。

original: <mag>% chance to absorb the magicka from incoming spells.
string: <mag>%几率吸收来自承受的法术的魔力。

original: Summons a Winged Twilight for <dur> seconds that wields storm magic and attacks with a powerful shriek. Summons help from her sisters when injured.
string: 召唤一个有翼暮光，持续<dur>秒，施展风暴魔法，并以强大的尖啸进行攻击。受伤时会召唤姐妹协助。

original: Become light as a feather for <dur> seconds, allowing you to walk on water and float down safely from high places.
string: 变得像羽毛一样轻盈，持续<dur>秒，可在水上行走并可从高处安全地漂浮落下。

original: Cast on an ally while holding a self-targeted spell in your other hand to cast that spell on them. Consumes magicka equal to the selected spell cost.
string: 对一名盟友施放，同时另一只手装备一个以自身为目标的法术，可对其施放该法术。消耗的魔力值等于所选法术的魔力值。

original: A stream of sunlight that deals <mag> damage per second to undead.
string: 一道阳光，每秒对亡灵造成<mag>点伤害。

original: Transform into a horse for <dur> seconds. While transformed, you can sprint like the wind and jump over obstacles. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为马，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你可以如风一样奔跑并跳过障碍物。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Transform into a fox for <dur> seconds. While transformed, you are hard to detect and most creatures and people will ignore you. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为狐狸，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你很难被发现，大多数生物和人类都会忽略你。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Transform into a bristleback for <dur> seconds. While transformed, your have extra armor and can lunge to knock down enemies. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为鬃背兽，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你将获得额外护甲值，并可猛扑击倒敌人。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Transform into a frostbite spider for <dur> seconds. While transformed, you are resistant to poison, your attacks deal poison damage, and you can spit acid. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为霜噬蜘蛛，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你将获得毒素抗性，你的攻击将造成毒素伤害，并可以喷吐酸液。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Transform into a chaurus hunter for <dur> seconds.  While transformed, you can spit acid and deliver lethal stings, you are resistant to magic, and your wings allow you to float.  (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为查鲁斯猎手，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你可以喷吐酸液并进行致命刺击，同时获得魔法抗性，并且翅膀使你可以漂浮。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Transform the living target into a random harmless animal for <dur> seconds. If hit, they instantly transform back.
string: 将活体目标随机变为无害动物，持续<dur>秒。如果被击中，目标会立即变回原形。

original: Violently hurl the friendly conjured or reanimated minion back to Oblivion, unleashing an explosion that deals <40> magic damage to nearby enemies.
string: 猛烈地将召唤或复活的友方仆从扔回湮灭，引发爆炸，对附近的敌人造成<40>点魔法伤害。

original: Creates a magic crown for <dur> seconds. While equipped, bound weapons deal <50>% more damage and bound shield creates a ward when blocking.
string: 创造一顶魔法王冠，持续<dur>秒。装备时，凝聚武器造成的伤害提升<50>%，凝聚盾会在格挡时创造一个结界护盾。

original: While blocking, creates a ward that protects against spells for up to <mag> points.
string: 防御时，制造一个结界，可以抵挡<mag>点魔法伤害。

original: An arcane blast that does <mag> magic damage in a <10> foot radius.
string: 一道奥术冲击，在半径<10>英尺的范围内造成<mag>点魔法伤害。

original: Creates a magic staff for <dur> seconds that deals damage based on your Conjuration skill. Sheathe it to dispel.
string: 创造一根魔法法杖，持续<dur>秒，根据你的召唤系技能造成伤害。收起即可驱散。

original: Summoned targets up to level <mag> are sent back to Oblivion.
string: 使最高<mag>级以内被召唤的目标遣送回湮灭。

original: Undead up to level <mag> flee for <dur> seconds.
string: 使最高<mag>级以内亡灵逃开<dur>秒。

original: If target dies within <dur> seconds, fills a soul gem.
string: 如果目标在<dur>秒内死亡，可为一颗灵魂石充能。

original: Summons a Dremora Sorceress for <dur> seconds. The Sorceress wields fire magic and summons flame atronachs.
string: 召唤一个魔人女术士，持续<dur>秒。女术士使用火焰魔法，并能召唤火焰侍灵。

original: Summons a powerful Lurker for <dur> seconds.
string: 召唤一个强大的深潜者，持续<dur>秒。

original: Summons a Dremora Berserker for <dur> seconds that grows more powerful as it loses health.
string: 召唤一个魔人狂战士，持续<dur>秒。其生命值越低，威力就越大。

original: Conjure a random wild atronach for <dur> seconds that will attack anyone nearby. Does not count against your summoning limit.
string: 召唤一个随机的野生侍灵攻击附近任何目标，持续<dur>秒。不计入你的召唤限制。

original: Conjure a Will-o-Wisp that will lead you to the nearest treasure or ore vein... or sometimes, the nearest danger.
string: 召唤鬼火，它会带你找到最近的宝藏或矿脉……或者有时候是，最近的危险。

original: For <dur> seconds, the target conjured or reanimated creature deals <mag>x damage. When the effect ends, the creature detonates for <60> points of magic damage to nearby enemies.
string: <dur>秒内，作为目标的召唤或复活的生物将造成<mag>倍的伤害。效果结束时，该生物将爆炸，对附近的敌人造成<60>点魔法伤害。

original: A wave of kinetic force that deals <mag> points of pure damage and can stagger the target.
string: 一股动能波动，造成<mag>点纯粹伤害，并使目标失衡。

original: Can pull objects, people, and creatures to you from a distance, then throw them. Objects can be added to your inventory.
string: 可以将物体，人和生物从远处拉过来，或者投掷出去。可以将物体添加到背包。

original: Teleport to a personal pocket dimension containing a bed, chests, bookshelves, and all crafting stations.
string: 传送到个人口袋维度，其中包含床、箱子、书架和所有制作站点。

original: Move <mag>% faster and jump twice as high for <dur> seconds.
string: 移动速度提高<mag>%，并且跳跃高度翻倍，持续<dur>秒。

original: Create an impenetrable dome of energy around you for <dur> seconds that prevents anything from passing in or out.
string: 在你周围创造一个持续<dur>秒的无法穿透的能量穹顶，阻止任何东西进出。

original: Create a copy of an item in your inventory. Cannot copy Divine or Daedric artifacts.
string: 复制一件你背包中的物品。无法复制神器或魔神器。

original: Cast on an ore vein to extract its minerals and gems. The higher your Alteration skill, the more ore and gems that can be pulled from the rock.
string: 对矿脉施法，开采其中的矿物和宝石。你的变化系技能越高，从岩石中开采出的矿石和宝石就越多。

original: Can see in the dark for <dur> seconds.
string: 可以在黑暗中看见，持续<dur>秒。

original: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for <mag> points of pure damage when enemies come near, staggering them.
string: 在附近表面施放符文，当敌人靠近时，爆炸造成<mag>点纯粹伤害，并使敌人失衡。

original: Shoot a ball of kinetic force that explodes on impact, dealing <mag> points of pure damage and staggering anything within 15 feet.
string: 射出一个动能球，撞击时爆炸，造成<mag>点纯粹伤害，并使15英尺范围内的所有单位失衡。

original: An explosion of kinetic force centered on the caster, dealing <mag> points of pure damage and flinging away all targets within 100 feet. The ground will continue to quake with aftershocks for <12> seconds.
string: 以施法者为中心的动能爆发，造成<mag>点纯粹伤害，并将100英尺内的所有目标推开。地面将持续震动并伴随<12>秒的余震。

original: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for <mag> points of sun damage when undead enemies come near and sets them on fire.
string: 在附近表面施放符文，当亡灵敌人靠近时，爆炸造成<mag>点太阳伤害，并使其着火。

original: Cast on a corpse to implant it with a <Frostbite Spider> egg that will hatch in <dur> seconds. Hatched creatures are allied with you.
string: 对尸体施放此咒语，向其植入一颗将在<dur>秒内孵化的<霜噬蜘蛛>卵。孵化出的生物将成为你的盟友。

original: Cast on a corpse to implant it with a <Chaurus Reaper> egg that will hatch in <dur> seconds. Hatched creatures are allied with you.
string: 对尸体施放此咒语，向其植入一颗将在<dur>秒内孵化的<查鲁斯收割者>卵。孵化出的生物将成为你的盟友。

original: Cast on a corpse to implant it with an <Ash Hopper> egg that will hatch in <dur> seconds. Hatched creatures are allied with you.
string: 对尸体施放此咒语，向其植入一颗将在<dur>秒内孵化的<灰烬跳虫>卵。孵化出的生物将成为你的盟友。

original: For <dur> seconds, your poison and disease spells ignore all resistances and can affect any type of enemy; Cocoon spells can be used on any type of corpse.
string: <dur>秒内，你的毒素和疾病法术会忽略所有抗性并可影响任何类型的敌人，茧类法术可在任何类型的尸体上使用。

original: Spray on the ground, it creates a wall of sun fire that does <50> damage per second to undead.
string: 在地面上制造一堵阳光火焰墙，每秒对亡灵造成<50>点伤害。

original: Heals the daedra, familiar, or machine target <mag> points per second, but not the living or undead.
string: 每秒治疗迪德拉、使魔或机器目标的生命值<mag>点，但不能治疗活物或亡灵。

original: A stream of sunlight that deals <mag> damage per second to undead.
string: 阳光束流对不死族造成每秒<mag>点伤害

original: A shard of ice that does <mag> frost damage and causes a patch of deadly icicles to form beneath the target.
string: 一块寒冰碎片，造成<mag>霜冻伤害，并在目标下方形成一片致命的冰锥。

original: A wave of kinetic force that deals <mag> points of pure damage and can stagger the target.
string: 一股动能波动，造成<mag>点纯粹伤害，并使目标失衡。

original: Shoot a ball of kinetic force that explodes on impact, dealing <mag> points of pure damage and staggering anything within 15 feet.
string: 射出一个动能球，撞击时爆炸，造成<mag>点纯粹伤害，并使15英尺范围内的所有单位失衡。

original: For <dur> seconds, poison and disease resistance are increased by <mag>%.
Summon a blazing miniature sun for <dur> seconds that turns night into day and burns nearby undead for <mag> damage per second.
string: 召唤一个持续<dur>秒的炽热微型太阳，将黑夜变成白昼，并灼烧附近的亡灵，每秒造成<mag>点伤害。

original: Plants a seed that weakens the target's poison resistance by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.
string: 种下一颗种子，使目标的毒素抗性减弱<mag>%，持续<dur>秒。

original: If they are hit by another poison effect, the seed explodes for <mag> damage.
string: 如果它们被另一种毒素效果击中，种子就会爆炸并造成<mag>伤害。

original: Causes <mag> points of poison damage for <dur> seconds.
string: 每秒减损目标<mag>点生命，持续<dur>秒。

original: Grows a deadly mushroom at the target location for <30> seconds. Opponents who come near the mushroom are poisoned, taking <4> damage per second for <10> seconds.
string: 在目标位置生长出一朵致命的蘑菇，持续<30>秒。靠近蘑菇的对手会中毒，每秒受到<4>点伤害，持续<10>秒。

original: Causes <mag> points of poison damage for <dur> seconds.
string: 每秒减损目标<mag>点生命，持续<dur>秒。

original: Infects the target with a virulent disease that deals <mag> damage every <5> seconds for <dur> seconds.
string: 使目标感染一种恶性疾病，每<5>秒造成<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: A swarm of flies that does <mag> disease damage per second.
string: 一群飞虫，每秒造成<mag>点疾病伤害。

original: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <8> points of poison damage per second.
string: <dur>秒内，近战范围内的敌人受到每秒<8>点毒素伤害。

original: Fills the area around the caster with toxic gas that deals <mag> poison damage per second. Lasts <dur> seconds.
string: 使施法者周围区域充满有毒气体，每秒造成<mag>点毒素伤害。持续<dur>秒。

original: A toxic orb that explodes on impact, dealing <mag> poison damage and leaving a glob of acid where it lands.
string: 剧毒的球体，在撞击时会爆炸，造成<mag>毒素伤害，并在落地处留下一团酸液。

original: Blesses the target with <mag>% faster regeneration for health, magicka, and stamina for <dur> seconds. Cannot be cast if you have committed murder.
string: 祝福目标，使目标生命、魔力和耐力恢复速度提升<mag>%，持续<dur>秒。若你犯下过谋杀罪行，则无法施放。

original: Blesses the target with a guardian spirit for <60> seconds. Cannot be cast if you have committed murder.
string: 以守护之灵祝福目标，持续<60>秒。若你犯下过谋杀罪行，则无法施放。

original: Blesses the target with <mag> points of armor
Cannot be cast if you have committed murder.
string: 若你犯下过谋杀罪行，则无法施放。

original: Channel a gout of dragon fire that deals <mag> fire damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.
string: 引导一股龙之火焰，每秒造成<mag>点火焰伤害。着火的目标受到额外伤害。

original: Channel a blast of frozen air that deals <mag> frost damage to health and stamina per second.
string: 引导一股冰冻气流，每秒对生命和耐力造成<mag>点寒霜伤害。

original: Drains magicka from all surrounding enemies while charging; when released, creates a <mag> point electric explosion centered on the caster. Damage increases based on the magicka drained while charging.
string: 充能时吸取周围所有敌人的魔力；释放时，以施法者为中心制造一个<mag>点的电击爆炸。伤害会根据充能时吸取的魔力增加。

original: Manifests the living spirit of fire to fight at your side for <dur> seconds. When the effect ends, it explodes for <mag> fire damage.
string: 凝聚鲜活的火焰之灵，与你并肩作战，持续<dur>秒。效果结束时，火焰之灵会爆炸，造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: Burns the target for <mag> points. Targets on fire take extra damage.
string: 灼烧目标，造成<mag>点伤害。着火目标会受到额外伤害。

original: Create a ball of storm energy at the target location for <dur> seconds that will shoot lightning at nearby enemies.
string: 在目标位置创建一个持续<dur>秒的风暴能量球，向附近的敌人发射闪电。

original: A bolt of lightning that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and half that to Magicka.
string: 释放一道闪电，对生命造成<mag>点伤害，并减损伤害值一半的法力。

original: Freeze yourself into solid ice for <dur> seconds. While frozen, you cannot move or attack, but you are immune to harm and surrounded by a barrier of jagged ice that damages enemies.
string: 将自己冻结成坚冰，持续<dur>秒。冻结期间，你无法移动或攻击，但免疫伤害，并被一道锯齿冰霜屏障所包围，可对敌人造成伤害。

original: Silently ignites the target for <mag> fire damage. Deals <2x> damage if undetected.
string: 静默地点燃目标，造成<mag>点火焰伤害。若未被发现，则造成<2>倍伤害。

original: Silently zaps the target for <mag> shock damage. Deals <2x> damage if undetected.
string: 静默地电击目标，造成<mag>点闪电伤害。若未被发现，则造成<2>倍伤害。

original: A tiny sliver of ice that silently inflicts <mag> frost damage. Deals <2x> damage if undetected.
string: 一小片冰晶，静默地造成<mag>点寒霜伤害。若未被发现，则造成<2>倍伤害。

original: Silently turns the touched target into a living bomb, which explodes for <mag> fire damage in a <15> foot radius after <dur> seconds.
string: 静默地将接触到的目标变成一颗活体炸弹，在<dur>秒后爆炸，在半径<15>英尺的范围内造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: Silently deals <mag> frost damage to the touched target.
string: 静默地对接触到的目标造成<mag>点寒霜伤害。
若未被发现，则造成<2>倍伤害

original: and the target is frozen solid for <dur> seconds.
Silently deals <mag> shock damage to the touched target.
string: 静默地对接触道的目标造成<mag>点电击伤害。
若未被发现，则造成<2>倍伤害

original: and absorbs all magicka from the target.
string: 并吸收目标的全部魔力。

original: Creates a greatsword of pure flame for <dur> seconds. Power attacks send out a wave of fire.
string: 制造一把由纯粹火焰构成的巨剑，持续<dur>秒。重击会发出一道火焰波。

original: Creates a warhammer of pure ice for <dur> seconds. Power attacks cause a spear of ice to erupt from the ground beneath the target.
string: 制造一把由纯粹寒冰构成的战锤，持续<dur>秒。重击会从目标脚下的地面射出一根冰矛。

original: Creates a magic woodcutter's axe for <dur> seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.
string: 创造一把魔法伐木斧，持续<dur>秒。收起即可驱散

original: Creates a magic pickaxe for <dur> seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.
string: 创造一把魔法鹤嘴锄，持续<dur>秒。收起即可驱散

original: Summon a familiar of your choice permanently.
string: 永久召唤一个你选择的使魔。

original: Summons a Direwolf Familiar permanently. While active, your Direwolf Familiar boosts your speed by +<mag>%.
string: 永久召唤一个冰原狼使魔。你的冰原狼使魔会使你的速度提高<mag>%。

original: Summons a Sabre Cat Familiar permanently. While active, your Sabrecat Familiar boosts your attack damage by +<mag>%.
string: 永久召唤一个剑齿虎使魔。剑齿虎使魔会使你的攻击伤害提高<mag>%。

original: Summons a Bear Familiar permanently. While active, your Bear Familiar grants you +<mag> armor.
string: 永久召唤一个熊使魔。你的熊使魔会使你的护甲值提高<mag>点。

original: Summons a Troll Familiar permanently. While active, your Troll Familiar boosts your health regen by +<mag>%.
string: 永久召唤一个巨魔使魔。你的巨魔使魔会使你的生命恢复速度提高<mag>%。

original: Cast separately with your left and right hands to place linked portals at the target locations. You can travel between the portals at will. Casting again will move the portal for that hand. (Portals last <3> days)
string: 分别用左右手施放，即可在目标位置放置相连的传送门。你可以随意在传送门之间移动。再次施放将移动那只手对应的传送门。（传送门持续<3>天）

original: Transform into a snow bear for <dur> seconds. While transformed, you have extra armor and frost resistance, and can roar to frighten enemies. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为雪熊，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你将获得额外的护甲和寒霜抗性，并能发出咆哮来震慑敌人。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.
string: 使最高<mag>级以内的生物和人类逃开<dur>秒。

original: Transform into a sabrecat for <dur> seconds. While transformed, your claws shred armor and cause bleeding. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为剑齿虎，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你的爪子会撕碎护甲并造成流血。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Transform into a wolf for <dur> seconds. While transformed, you can howl to summon nearby wolves to your aid. (Use voice power to revert)
string: 变身为狼，持续<dur>秒。变身期间，你可以发出嚎叫，召唤附近的狼来协助你。（使用吼声能力恢复原型）

original: Swap places with the target, if they can be moved. Also works on intact corpses.
string: 如果目标可被移动，则与其交换位置。对完好的尸体也有效。

original: A shard of ice that does <mag> frost damage and causes a patch of deadly icicles to form beneath the target.
string: 一块寒冰碎片，造成<mag>霜冻伤害，并在目标下方形成一片致命的冰锥。

original: Target is slowed by <mag>% for <dur> sec.
string: 目标的速度降低<mag>%，持续<dur>秒。

original: For <dur> seconds, you gain <mag>% frost resistance and nearby enemies have their frost resistance reduced by <33>%.
string: <dur>秒内，你的霜冻抗性提升<mag>%，并使附近敌人的霜冻抗性降低<33>%。

original: For <dur> seconds, you gain <mag>% fire resistance and absorb <30>% of the magicka from hostile fire spells.
string: <dur>秒内，你的火焰抗性提升<mag>%，并吸收<30>%来自敌对火焰法术的魔力。

original: For <dur> seconds, you gain <mag>% shock resistance and your weapon attacks deal <15> shock damage.
string: <dur>秒内，你的闪电抗性增加<mag>%，武器攻击造成<15>点闪电伤害。

original: Silently deals <mag> frost damage to the touched target.
string: 静默地对接触到的目标造成<mag>点寒霜伤害。

original: Electrifies the target for <dur> seconds, dealing <mag> shock damage every <3> seconds. Damage occurs every <2> seconds instead if the target is made of metal or wearing metal armor.
string: 电击目标<dur>秒，每<3>秒造成<mag>点闪电伤害。如果目标由金属组成或穿着金属护甲，则每<2>秒造成一次伤害。

original: Ignites the target, dealing <mag> fire damage per second for <dur> seconds. Damage increases with the target's remaining health.
string: 点燃目标，每秒造成<mag>点火焰伤害，持续<dur>秒。目标剩余生命值越高，伤害越高。

original: Creates a bow of pure electricity for <dur> seconds that shoots chain lightning bolts.
string: 制造一把由纯粹电流构成的弓，持续<dur>秒，能够发射连锁闪电箭。

original: Creatures and people are disoriented for <dur> seconds, causing them to periodically stagger.
string: 生物和人类会在<dur>秒内迷失方向，使他们周期性地失衡。

original: Create a phantom rabbit at the target location for <dur> seconds that will distract enemies and lead them in a random direction. Phantoms do no damage and cannot be harmed.
string: 在目标位置召唤一只幻影兔，持续<dur>秒，分散敌人的注意力，并将其引向随机方向。幻影不会造成伤害，也不会受到伤害。

original: Create a phantom mudcrab at the target location for <dur> seconds that will spawn additional phantom mudcrabs when attacked. Phantoms do no damage and cannot be harmed.
string: 在目标位置召唤一只幻影泥沼蟹，持续<dur>秒。受到攻击时，会生成更多幻影泥沼蟹。幻影不会造成伤害，也不会受到伤害。

original: For <dur> seconds, the target person or creature loses <mag>% of their maximum health whenever they attack or cast a spell.
string: <dur>秒内，目标人物或生物每次攻击或施法时都会失去<mag>%最大生命值的生命。

original:
Leave your body for <dur> seconds, becoming an invisible and undetectable spirit. When the effect ends, you will return to your body. (Cannot interact with the world in spirit form)
.
string: 离开你的肉体<dur>秒，成为一个隐形且无法被察觉的灵体。效果结束后，你将回归肉体。（灵魂形态下无法与世界交互）

original: Staggers the target person or creature and drains them of all stamina. The target cannot power attack for <dur> seconds.
string: 使目标人物或生物失衡，并耗尽其所有耐力。目标在<dur>秒内无法进行重击。

original: Dispels all active magic effects on the target person or creature and interrupts spellcasting. The target cannot cast spells for <dur> seconds.
string: 驱散目标人物或生物身上所有生效的魔法效果，并中断其施法。目标在<dur>秒内无法施法。

original: Staggers the target person or creature and drains them of all stamina. The target will move and attack <mag>% slower for <dur> seconds.
string: 使目标人物或生物失衡，并耗尽其所有体力。目标的移动速度和攻击速度降低<mag>%，持续<dur>秒。

original: For <dur> seconds, your Speechcraft skill is increased by <1> for every <3> levels of your Illusion skill.
string: <dur>秒内，你的幻术系技能每提升过<3>级，你的口才技能就会增加<1>级。

original: Creatures and people up to level <mag> will follow you and fight for you for <120> seconds.
string: <mag>级以内的生物和人类将跟随你并帮你战斗<120>秒。

original: Creatures and people up to level <14> will follow you and fight for you for <120> seconds.
string: <14>级以内的生物和人类将跟随你并帮你战斗<120>秒。

original: Creatures and people up to level <mag> will follow you and fight for you until released. Only 1 target can be enthralled at a time.
string: <mag>级以内的生物和人类将跟随你并帮你战斗，直到被释放。最多同时奴役一个目标。

original: Creatures and people up to level <25> will follow you and fight for you until released.
string: <25>级以内的生物和人类将跟随你并帮你战斗，直到被释放。

original: Concentrate to silently charge the target with electric potential; when released, the target takes shock damage equal to the magicka drained while casting.
string: 集中精力，用电势静默地为目标充电；释放时，目标受到的闪电伤害等于施法时消耗的魔力值。

original: A ball of green flames that ignites the target, dealing <mag> damage per sec. for <dur> seconds and leaving a trail of fire.
string: 一团绿色火焰，点燃目标，每秒造成<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒，并留下一道火焰轨迹。

original: Targets below half health flee in terror;
string: 生命值低于一半的目标会惊恐地逃跑；

original: targets above half health will attack anything nearby.
string: 生命值超过一半的目标会攻击附近的任何生物。

original: Create a fragile ice cyrstal at the target location. When hit with an attack, arrow, spell, or explosion, it shatters into jagged shards that deal <mag> frost damage to anything nearby.
string: 在目标位置制造一颗易碎的冰晶。被攻击、箭矢、法术或爆炸击中时，冰晶会碎裂成锯齿碎片，对附近的所有生物造成<mag>的寒霜伤害。

original: Concentrate to silently lure the target towards you.
string: 集中注意力，静默地将目标引向你。

original: Persuasion attempts are <15>% easier. Calm spells are <30>% stronger against targets within 30 feet. Lasts <dur> seconds.
string: 说服尝试难度降低<15>%。平静法术对30英尺内的目标效果提升<30>%。持续<dur>秒。

original: Intimidation attempts are <50>% more likely to succeed. Fear spells are <30>% stronger against targets within 30 feet. Lasts <dur> seconds.
string: 恐吓尝试的成功率提高<50>%。恐惧法术对30英尺内的目标的效果提高<30>%。持续<dur>秒。

original: Nearby allies have their combat skills increased by <20> points. Fury spells are <30>% stronger against targets within 30 feet. Lasts <dur> seconds.
string: 附近盟友的战斗技能提升<20>点。愤怒法术对30英尺内的目标的效果提升<30>%。持续<dur>秒。

original: The target is forced to attack a phantom decoy for <dur> seconds. The decoy does no damage, but any harm it takes is transferred to the target instead.
string: 目标被迫攻击一个幻影诱饵，持续<dur>秒。诱饵不会造成伤害，但其受到的伤害会转移到目标身上。

original: The target is attacked by their phantom doppelganger for <dur> seconds.
string: 目标会受到其幻影分身的攻击，持续<dur>秒。

original: Create a phantom treasure chest at the target location for <dur> seconds that will attract and pacify all nearby people up to level <mag>.
string: 在目标位置创建一个幻影宝箱，持续<dur>秒，吸引并安抚附近所有<mag>级以内的人类。

original: People up to level <mag> nearby won't fight for <dur> seconds.
string: 附近<mag>级以内的人类停止战斗<dur>秒。

original: Create <2> phantom copies of yourself for <dur> seconds. The copies have the same weapons, armor, and spells as you, but are only half as strong.
string: 创造<2>个你自己的幻影复制体，持续<dur>秒。这些复制体拥有与你相同的武器、护甲和法术，但强度只有你的一半。

original: Cast at a target or corpse to silently disguise yourself as one of their allies for <dur> seconds. Cannot be cast during combat.
string: 对目标或尸体施放此技能，使自身静默地伪装成其盟友，持续<dur>秒。战斗中无法施放。

original: Maximum health reduced by <mag> points. On death, you will be revived at full health, sacrificing your Dark Crystal.
string: 最大生命减少<mag>点。死亡后，你将复活并恢复满血状态，并失去你的黑暗水晶。

original: Store part of your soul in a black soul gem, gaining immortality but reducing your health by <25> points. The Dark Crystal will shatter when you are hit with a killing blow, reviving you with full health.
string: 将你的部分灵魂储存于一颗黑色灵魂石中，获得永生，但生命值会减少<25>点。当你受到致命一击时，黑暗水晶会破碎，让你满血复活。

original: A psychic blast that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies equal to your missing health.
string: 精神冲击，对附近的所有敌人造成魔法伤害，伤害值等于你已损失的生命值。

original: Summons a Dremora Sorceress for <dur> seconds. The Sorceress wields fire magic and summons flame atronachs.
string: 召唤一个魔人女术士，持续<dur>秒。女术士使用火焰魔法，并能召唤火焰侍灵。

original: A swarm of flies that does <mag> diesease damage per second.
string: 一群苍蝇，每秒造成<mag>点疾病伤害。

original: Plants a seed that weakens the target's poison resistance by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.
string: 种下一颗种子，使目标的毒素抗性减弱<mag>%，持续<dur>秒。

original: If they are hit by another poison effect, the seed explodes for <mag> damage.
string: 如果它们被另一种毒素效果击中，种子就会爆炸并造成<mag>伤害。

original: A toxic orb that explodes on impact, dealing <mag> poison damage and leaving a glob of acid where it lands.
string: 剧毒的球体，在撞击时会爆炸，造成<mag>毒素伤害，并在落地处留下一团酸液。

original: Infects the target with a virulent disease that deals <mag> damage every <5> seconds for <dur> seconds.
string: 使目标感染一种恶性疾病，每<5>秒造成<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: For <dur> seconds, you gain <mag>% frost resistance and nearby enemies have their frost resistance reduced by <33>%.
string: <dur>秒内，你的霜冻抗性提升<mag>%，并使附近敌人的霜冻抗性降低<33>%。

original: Heals the daedra, familiar, or machine target <mag> points, but not the living or undead.
string: 治疗迪德拉、使魔或机器目标的生命值<mag>点，但不能治疗活物或亡灵。

original: Spray on the ground, it creates a wall of sun fire that does <50> damage per second to undead.
string: 在地面形成日光火墙，对不死族造成每秒<50>点伤害

original: Creatures and people up to level <25> will follow you and fight for you until released.
string: 等级<25>以下的生物与人类将永久跟随并为你作战。

original: Scroll of Rite of the Old Gods

string: 恐惧之茧
鳞片之茧

Rite of the Old Gods
string: 古神仪式

string: 奥术治疗
治疗奥术
生命平分

string: 召唤冰原狼使魔
舒缓光环

毒素之种
野蛮生长

string: 召唤剑齿虎使魔

string: 召唤熊使魔

string: 召唤巨魔使魔

string: 召唤猛犸使魔
存储尸体

original: Conjure Winged Twilight
string: 召唤有翼暮光

original: Ray of Light

string: 变形术：狐狸
变形术：鬃背兽
变形术：霜噬蜘蛛
法术书：变身查鲁斯猎手

original: Polymorph: Chaurus Hunter
string: 变形术：查鲁斯猎手
引爆奴仆
法术书：召唤魔人女术士

original: Conjure Dremora Sorceress
string: 召唤魔人女术士
爆裂符文
震荡冲击
超级充能奴仆
口袋维度
魔法屏障
提取矿石
旭日符文
召唤深潜者
法术书：召唤魔人狂战士

original: Conjure Dremora Berserker
string: 召唤魔人狂战士
强力念动术
变形术：马
召唤鬼火
力量波动
蛛网之茧

original: The weight of murder on your soul causes your spell to wither and fade away...
string: 谋杀的重担压在你的灵魂上，使你的法术逐渐枯萎、消失……

original: Glamour failed, this target has no allies...
string: 迷惑失败，该目标没有盟友……

original: You don't have the knowledge needed to extract this ore...
string: 你不具备提取这种矿石所需的知识......

original: You have been cured of Vampirism!
string: 你的吸血鬼化被治愈了！

original: You have been cured of Lycanthropy!
This lock is too strong for you to open...
string: 这把锁太坚固了，你打不开……

original: That spell can't be used now.
The Will-o-Wisp could not find anything nearby...
string: 鬼火在附近找不到任何东西……

original: The Will-o-Wisp cannot lead you to what it found...
string: 鬼火无法带你找到它所发现的东西……

original: Cannot duplicate Divine or Daedric artifacts.
string: 无法复制神器或魔神器。

original: You already have a Dark Crystal.
string: 你已经有一颗黑暗水晶了。

original: An empty black soul gem is required to create a Dark Crystal.
string: 制造黑暗水晶需要一颗空的黑色灵魂石。

original: Lost Grimoire is up to date!
This lock cannot be opened with magic.
string: 这把锁无法用魔法打开。

original: Choose a Faithful Familiar to summon:
string: 选择要召唤的忠实使魔

original: This portal seems to go nowhere...
string: 这个传送门似乎没有通往其他地方……

original: A powerful force prevents you from opening a portal here...
string: 一股强大的力量阻止你在这里打开传送门……

original: You don't have enough magicka to bestow the spell...
string: 你没有足够的魔力来施展法术......

original: A powerful force prevents you from leaving this plane...
string: 一股强大的力量阻止你离开这个位面……

original: You cannot smell any wolves nearby...
string: 你在附近闻不到任何狼的气味……

original: Could not find a spell to bestow....
string: 找不到可以施展的法术……

original: Staggers targets and knocks over loose objects.
string: 使目标失衡并且击倒松散的物体。
